name: Make Way (LuTDC)
description:
** Game developed for Ludum Dare 49 **

You are lost in a strange and dark place armed only with your pocket map. But, it seems to fail sometimes, so, you must look around for some kind of "signal" to be able to use it properly.

Instructions

WASD - walk

Arrow keys - move the minimap

E - interact

Team

Programming, art, sfx, game design - @lutd_c

Github repository: https://github.com/LuTDC/make-way
